options.name: index_id
options.description: Use this index ID in ElasticSearch (instead of default)

options.name: doc_id
options.description: Use this document ID in ElasticSearch (instead of default)

input.name: ih_settings
input.description: Default values for inputs in IH (default index : prefix + input name if no specific index and doc id is provided)

input.name: pas_settings
input.description: Settings for the PAS_model to produce a PAS. Used for components selection (PAS builder and outcome modules as energy consumption and pollutant emissions) with the corresponding settings

input.name: vesselcalls
input.description: List of vessels stopover in terminal that will require to be handled. Each one is converter to one or more handlings (e.g. if unloading then loading): Vessel-calls (1 --> N) Handlings

options.name: start
options.description: Use only vesse-calls with a scheduled arrival on dock after this date

options.name: end
options.description: Use only vesse-calls with a scheduled arrival on dock before this date

input.name: contenttypes
input.description: Used for handling assignation to a supplychain: Handling (1 --> 1) Supplychain

input.name: supplychains
input.description: List of available supply-chains (sequence of operations) for handling a vessel s content. Used for resources allocation: Supply-chain (1 --> N) Operations

input.name: resources
input.description: List of available resources (machines, areas etc) for supply-chain s operations. Used by PAS_builder for use calculation (scheduling) and by outcome modules (energy consumption, pollutant emission): Resource (1 --> N) Operations

input.name: timetables
input.description: List of available timetables (working days & hours) for resources. Used by PAS_builder for use calculation (scheduling): Timetable (1 --> N) Resources

input.name: priority
input.description: Hierarchical sequence of vessel-call attributes defining the handling s priority. Used to resolve resources allocation priority (in case of competition for access to a resource in the same time)

forceinput.name: pas_settings
forceinput.description: Settings for the PAS_model to produce a PAS. Used for components selection (PAS builder and outcome modules as energy consumption and pollutant emissions) with the corresponding settings
